title: You know who are the real problem players in URF?
body:
The people who get mad at you for wanting to win

"omg it's a fun game who cares if we win" *proceeds to lose on purpose to "get back at the guy who wants to win"*

yeah that's so much more healthy than picking a meta champion and trying to win in a competitive game

can those of you who don't understand competition just please quit and go join a co-op and focus on growing plants and sustaining water or something in pomona because you're utterly useless here.
